explanation: Multiple participants mention bullish sentiment, references to 1-minute stochastics pointing up and anticipation of a pump, as well as strong support levels (107k) and large sell orders (108050) indicating imminent liquidity moves. While some urge caution with stop losses and discuss significant resistance and liquidation points, the majority lean bullish short-term. No clear consensus on extreme high conviction, but overall the short-term direction is upward.
